창세

Genesis

재귀창조(Creation)

레벨: 조형가 9

표시: Material

구현 시간: One week (8 hours/일)

거리: 180 ft.; see text

효과: A demiplane coterminous with 영적 세계, centered on your location

지속시간: Instantaneous

내성 굴림: None

파워 저항: No

파워 포인트: 17, XP

You create a finite plane with limited access: a demiplane. Demiplanes created by this power are very small, very minor 이세계. This power works best when manifested while you are on 영적 세계. Manifestation of this power creates a local density fluctuation that precipitates the creation of a demiplane. At first, the fledgling plane grows in radius at a rate of 1 foot per day to an initial maximum radius of 180 feet as it rapidly draws substance from the surrounding astral ectoplasm. Once the new demiplane reaches its maximum size, it doesn’t really stop growing, but its growth rate decreases to only 1 foot per week (approximately a 50-foot increase in radius per year). Once your demiplane is created, you can travel to it using 영적 마차, 이세계 전이, or some other power or permanent link that you arrange for separately.

You determine 환경 within the demiplane when you manifest 창세, reflecting most any desire you can visualize. You determine factors such as atmosphere, water, temperature, and the general shape of the terrain. This power cannot create life (including vegetation), nor can it create 제작(such as buildings, roads, wells, 던전, and so forth). You must add these details in some other fashion if you desire. You can’t create lingering psionic effects with this power; you have to add those separately, if desired. Similarly, you can’t create a demiplane out of esoteric material, such as silver or uranium; you’re limited to stone and dirt. You can’t manipulate the time trait on your demiplane; its time trait is as 물질 세계. Once your demiplane reaches 180 feet in radius, you can manifest this power again to gradually add another 180 feet of radius to it, and so on.

Antigenesis: If 창세 is manifested on 물질 세계, the power takes effect and the demiplane begins to grow at the rate noted above, but it gets no larger than a radius of 1 foot per 레벨. The energies of the new plane are exactly canceled by the energies of the original plane, creating a 죽음 감지 like a limited cancer on the original plane. The expanding boundary of 죽음 감지 wipes away all 제작, crumbles natural land forms, and evaporates water, leaving behind a uniformly 레벨 범위 of inert dust. Living creatures that pass the boundary of the growing 죽음 감지 are not directly affected, but plants can find no 생활 유지 in the dust of 죽음 감지, water-breathing creatures die quickly when water turns to dust, and mobile animals know enough to leave 범위 alone. Once the wave of change passes, no special essence remains in 죽음 감지, and it may be colonized naturally over the course of several years by bacteria, plants, and animals.

XP Cost: 1,000 XP.

무기 이식

Graft Weapon

레벨: 사이킥 군인 3

The weapon becomes a natural extension of your arm, and that hand blends seamlessly into the shaft, hilt, or head of the weapon. Now that the weapon and you are one, you gain a +1 적성 보너스 on all 공격 and 피해 rolls while using the weapon.

The grafted weapon is considered both a standard weapon and a natural weapon for 목적 of effects that distinguish between either weapon type. For instance, the grafted weapon is treated as a natural weapon for 목적 of delivering a touch 공격 with a power in conjunction with the weapon 공격. As with any power (or spell) melee touch 공격 made in conjunction with a natural weapon 공격, the touch 공격 effect is not delivered unless the natural weapon strikes normally; on a failed 공격, the touch power (or spell) is wasted.

For a 사이킥 군인 under the effect of the 야수의 발톱 power, grafting a weapon means that 공격 with this hand deal the base 피해 of the weapon, instead of the claw upon which a 사이킥 군인 normally relies.

While your hand is grafted to a weapon, you lose the use of that hand and take a –2 페널티 on all 스킬 판정 requiring the use of hands. Powers that temporarily 변이 or metamorph you can ignore the grafted weapon or alter it normally, at your discretion. If the weapon takes 피해, you take 피해 as well. If you are healed, so is your grafted weapon. If your weapon is destroyed, you permanently lose 2 points of 건강; the ability drain persists until you can restore your natural anatomy (by means of 재생 or a similar effect).

When this power’s 지속시간 expires, the grafted weapon falls to the ground and your hand returns.

사이킥 뱀파이어

Psychic Vampire

레벨: 에고이스트 4, 사이킥 군인 4

표시: Mental

구현 시간: 1 standard action

내성 굴림: Fortitude negates

파워 포인트: 7

This power shrouds your hand or a natural weapon you possess with 암흑 that you can use to drain an opponent’s power.

If you manifest this power to affect your hand, the next successful melee touch 공격 you make (if the victim fails its Fortitude save) drains 2 파워 포인트 from your foe for every 구현자 레벨 you have. The drained points simply dissipate. Your touch 공격, charged with psionic power, is treated as an armed 공격.

사이코피드백

Psychofeedback

정신적대사작용

레벨: 에고이스트 5, 사이킥 군인 5

표시: Visual

구현 시간: 1 standard action

You can readjust your body to boost one physical ability score at the expense of one or more other scores. Select one ability score you would like to boost, and increase it by the same amount that you decrease one or more other scores. All score decreases are treated as a special form of ability 피해, called ability burn, which cannot be magically or psionically healed—it goes away only through natural 치료.
